name: Blindness
display_help: Blind Makwa is Blind.
display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} decreases your chance to hit severely.
display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} decreases your chance to hit with their {PowerName}!

name: Hack
display_help: You perform a standard attack with your katana. This attack is slower than Gambler's Cut, but deals more damage. Sting of the Wasp can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
display_target_help: The Katana has reduced your Defenses.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

name: Slice
display_help: You swing your katana in a wide arc in front of you, slicing multiple foes. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
display_target_help: The Katana has reduced your Defenses.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

name: Hand_Crossbow
display_help: Small rapid fire Handheld Crossbow.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

name: Dark_Destiny
display_help: You continuously remain hovering in a delicate psychic balance due to the traumas inflicted by Mother Mayhem and Malaise. When you are nearly defeated in combat, all control over this balance is lost, causing a powerful eruption of psionic energy that deals significant damage to your foes.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} has given in to their {PowerName}! Stop them before it is too late!

name: Night_Fall
display_help: Unleashes a cone shaped burst of particles from the Netherworld. All targets within the modest range of this power take Negative Energy damage and have a reduced chance to hit. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
display_target_help: Night Fall has reduced your chance to hit.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.

name: Gloom
display_help: Gloom slowly drains a target of life, while reducing their chance to hit. Slower than Dark Blast, but deals more damage over time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
display_target_help: The Gloom is causing damage to you and reducing your chance to hit.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.

name: Blackwand
display_help: This undead Midnighter's Blackwand still packs a potent punch even after its wielder's untimely demise.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

name: Explosion
display_help: You have erupted in a burst of negative energy!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

name: Hack
display_help: You Hack your opponent for a high amount of damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

name: Slash
display_help: You perform a quick Slash that can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. This attack causes moderate damage, but has a quick recharge time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

name: Whirling_Sword
display_help: You perform a Whirling Sword maneuver, attacking all foes in melee range. This attack wounds your opponents, causing them to take minor damage over time and reduces their defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

name: Tar_Patch
display_help: Drops a large patch of viscous Negative Energy which dramatically slows down enemies that run through it and reduces their damage resistance. Affected targets stuck in the Tar Patch cannot jump or fly. Recharge: Slow
display_target_help: Your Running speed and damage resistance is reduced by the Tar Patch. You cannot jump or fly away while in the Tar Patch

name: Tenebrous_Tentacles
display_help: You can create a cone shaped rift to the Netherworld that allows its native creatures to slip their oily Tentacles into our reality. These creatures will snare all foes within range, Immobilizing them while the Tentacles drain their life and reduce their chance to hit. Damage: Moderate(DoT)Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Moderate DMG(Negative/Smash), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit
display_target_help: The Tenebrous Tentacles are holding you immobile and reducing your chance to hit.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

name: World_of_Pain
display_help: When this power is activated the user and all nearby team members will gain a moderate damage, resistance, and To Hit bonus. Additionally those affected by this power will also be protected from Placate effects.
display_target_help: Your chance to hit, damage resistance, damage output is increased. Additionally your resistance to Placate is increased.
display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases your team's chance to hit, damage resistance, Placate protection and damage output.
display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's chance to hit, damage resistance, Placate protection and damage output with their {PowerName}!

name: Vengeance
display_help: The loss of a good leader can enrage the Shepherds. If a Soothsayer falls in battle, he can grant his teammates a bonus to their defense, their to hit, and their damage with his last breath.
display_target_help: The loss of a good leader can enrage the Shepherds. If a Soothsayer falls in battle, he can grant his teammates a bonus to their defense, their to hit, and their damage with his last breath.
